prompts.prompt: Read all available system cards (model cards) in the resources. Summarize each modelâ€™s main features, strengths, and ideal use cases in clear, non-technical language. Create a comparison table with key differences such as speed, quality, and best use case. Add a short, clear summary paragraph for each model and a practical recommendation for end users choosing between the models. If information is missing in any system card, mention that. Only use information from the resources.

template.name: explain-model-cards-for-end-user
template.title: Explain and compare model cards for end users
template.description: Reads all available system cards and produces a simple, end-user-friendly comparison and explanation, including a table of differences, model summaries, and practical recommendations.
